name: Artillery Duel Deluxe
overview: A new Commodore 64 game which is based around the ColecoVision version from Xonox! Artillery Duel Deluxe is one of many games in the genre of "turn-based artillery games". Such games are among the earliest computer games, with versions existing for mainframes with only teletype output. Scorched Earth, with a plethora of weapon types and power-ups, is considered the modern archetype of its format. Also all weapons are shown with tracers which allow the player to more accurately adjust the trajectory on their next turn! Works with the WiC64 for online modes, duels with online players, watch online games and online leader board. Choose your grade for game difficulty: Private, Captain or General and gain rank as you play.
